    Californians: Know Your Dates

    Oct 19

    Deadline to register to vote

    Oct 27

    Deadline to request absentee ballot

    Nov 3

    Deadline to vote in person or mail your ballot

    Nov 20

    Deadline for your mail ballot to be received and counted

    Who We Are

    Our mission is to defend and extend economic justice, human rights, and political accountability. We use digital communications and strategic organizing to provide educational resources to all Californians. Courage California Institute is a 501(c)(3) non-profit organization and the educational arm of Courage California‚Äôs family of organizations.
